Reviews.Title: “Affordable, Well-located and a Great Hostel Overall”
Reviews.Author: Kayla A
Reviews.Content: ip hostel located straße near mtv germany wonderful hostel stayed recently berlin middle city bit center wonderful location train stops tourist attractions types transportation im lying five looked bike tram sbahn train ubahn subway bus perfect backpackers elderly issues lots bunk beds im utilities staff smiles spoke german english im else lobby seating chat friends pool table bar computer terminals fee etc bunk beds didnt im afraid top bunk dont remember seeing speck dust believe stay forgot dust clean possibly eat whatever prices 100€ nights includes keycard breakfast wonderful tax doesnt include 2€ laundry fee im definitely recommending hostel oh bring own towel toiletries

Reviews.Title: “A great hostel”
Reviews.Author: Maria K
Reviews.Content: hostel people id definitely suited elder gentlemen ladies quiet noisy night couples friends travelling college buddies stay located near east gallery 60 walk ubahn station warschauer str staff hostel nice store luggage lockers reception bartenders lovely girls reception helpful note additional fees added arrive hotel eg bedsheets etc stay avoid bringing own toilets shower tidy comfortable hostel prices dont bite regards russians sweden

Reviews.Title: “Cheap & Well Located”
Reviews.Author: Larry_Ketang
Reviews.Content: stayed mid feb found nice arent fancy clean bathroomshower excellent double bed actually single mattresses double bed frame comfortable tv wardrobe read trip advisor reviews staff rude found exact opposite staff nice extremely helpful hotel hostel dorm imagine staff lot requests drunk probably rude found hotel excellently located getting particularly eastside situated sbahn ubahn theres tram stop outside im planning berlin amazing city definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Nice and easy going place!”
Reviews.Author: Camilama
Reviews.Content: nice friendly helpful informative staff lots privacy lovely clean minimalist frills basics warschauer station lots transport choices metro sbahn trams o2 world river spree east gallery kreuzberg bridge highly recommed affordable relaxed easy stay berlin

Reviews.Title: “Good but not the best.”
Reviews.Author: TheAustralian_10
Reviews.Content: pretty hostel 10 eur night clean bed comfortable real hidden costs namely bedding costs 2 eur unreasonable annoying internet isnt free wouldnt function correctly showers type push button self period time saving water annoying washing locations pretty walk bars ubahn sbahn road plus tram breakfast costs 5 eur berlin expensive bakery instead

Reviews.Content: checked brand operation time week breath fresh air id highly recommend business traveler looking none stuffiness especially west berlin business classics helpful nononsense staff clean brandnew location link kreuzberg towards kudamm u1 rates excellent ill seen business hotel berlin try youre fed competition youre holiday clean decent central twist dont miss
